Name: BOSS
Text: All the fun sides of forestry with none of the bad.

Name: BOSS
Text: No sawdust, no noise, no screaming protesters.

Name: BOSS
Text: I bet you enjoyed your first day!

Name: BOSS
Text: I think I should say 'thank you for playing'

Name: BOSS
Text: but I'll just say don't be late tomorrow, we continue at 06:00.
